text: GoGo Sentai Boukenger is a Japanese television series. It is the 30th series in Toei's Super Sentai series. It is the first installment of Super Sentai to be broadcast in 16:9 aspect ratio. It premiered on February 19, 2006 at 7:30 JST on TV Asahi's 2006 Super Hero Time programming block, along with Kamen Rider Kabuto. Its footage was used in Power Rangers Operation Overdrive. ==Plot== To make sure that the Precious do not fall into the hands of the Negative Syndicates, the Search Guard Successor Foundation has developed its own special operations team, the Boukengers, to do battle and collect some of the more dangerous Precious. ==Characters== ===Boukenger=== Actor Name Rangers Mitsuomi Takahashi Satoru Akashi Bouken Red Yasuka Saitoh Masumi Inou Bouken Black Masashi Mikami Souta Mogami Bouken Blue Chise Nakamura Natsuki Mamiya Bouken Yellow Haruka Suenaga Sakura Nishihori Bouken Pink Masayuki Deai Eiji Takaoka Bouken Silver ==Cast== *: *: *: *: *: *: *: *: *: *: *: *: *: *: *: *: *: *Narrator, Boukenger Equipment Voice: ===Guest stars=== *: *: *: *: *: *: *: *Natsuki's father (33 & 34): *Natsuki's mother (33 & 34): *: *: ==Song== ;Opening theme * "GoGo Sentai Boukenger" **Lyrics: Yūho Iwasato **Composition: Nobuo Yamada **Arrangement: Seiichi Kyōda **Artist: NoB ;Ending theme * "Boukensha ON THE ROAD" ("Adventurers on the Road") **Lyrics: Yūho Iwasato **Composition: YOFFY **Arrangement: Psychic Lover & Kenichirō Ōishi **Artist: Psychic Lover Category:Super Sentai series Category:2006 television series debuts Category:2007 television series endings Category:2007 disestablishments in Japan
title: GoGo Sentai Boukenger
